directions: Mix avocado, red onion, cilantro, feta cheese, lime juice, jalapeno pepper, salt, and tomato together in a bowl.
Chill in refrigerator for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 lime, juiced, or more to taste
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, or to taste
title: Zilla's Guacamole (THE BEST)
